body.name: 5 Tiers Bookshelf Organizer White Faux Marble Shelf,Modern Open Display Storage Bookcase, and Metal Bookshelf Standing Storage Shelf Tall Shelving Units for Home Office Study
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 37 mins
features: ✔LARGE CAPACITY The size of this 5 shelf bookcase is 31.5 * 11 * 61.8 inches. The height of each shelf is approximately 13 inches. Each shelf can hold 75 pounds. You can store your essentials and decorations with confidence, without worrying about the partition being crushed or toppled.

✔STABLE & BEAUTIFUL A combination of selected high quality wood/white faux marble slabs and iron brackets, with a metal "X" shaped frame at the back, ensures the overall structural stability of the entire bookshelf.

✔ WIDELY USED With a simple and elegant 5 shelf wide board design and a steel frame, this ladder style bookshelf adds a sense of individuality to your family. This bookcase can be placed anywhere in the home.Keep your house neat and orderly.

✔QUALITY MATERIALS This bookshelf is made of high quality white faux marble and a gold steel frame. Unique artificial marble stripes, surface waterproof and scratch resistant. Add elegance and convenience to your home life.

✔MULTI-FUNCTIONAL The classic open storage shelf design provides sufficient platform for your items. For example, in the living room you can put your decorations, trophies, photos and so on. Place your microwave, POTS and other utensils in the kitchen.
body.description: Azheruol 5 Tiers White Faux Marble Bookshelf 5 Tiers Bookshelf This bookshelf size is 31.5 * 11 * 61.8 inches. Each shelf is 13 inches tall. You can use it to place decorative items, family photos, potted plants, microwave tableware, and more. Stable Structure This bookshelf can withstand a weight of 75 pounds per layer. There is also an "X" shaped bracket at the back of the shelf to help secure and prevent shaking. Easy To Assemble This five tiers bookshelf, due to its simple structure, will make it easy for you to install it. Provide necessary installation tools and instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Precisely the look I was going for, perfect backdrop for content. It’s not a heavy duty bookshelf, definitely will need to anchor if putting heavy weight on shelves (an anchor hardware is included). I love it, looks amazing in my content corner, love that it has longer shelves than most on Amazon. Super easy to put together. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great in my space and was fairly easy to assemble. Will say the shelves look a bit cheaper than the product photos, but all in all solid for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this bookshelf. I had a friend help me put it together and I do feel it is best assembled with two for ease. However, it is great, had extra pieces and very clear instructions. If I decide to get a second bookshelf I will definitely consider this one again or others from this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love the sturdiness of it and the natural wood

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the design of this bookshelf. It really has a slick look that is modern and a bit rustic. I wanted something that looked classy for my office and this shelf fits the bill. Quality is pretty good - similar to other value-based furniture that you might buy in a big box store. But the style really sets this one apart from others on the market. Assembly wasn't too bad if you are handy and patient.Overall this is a good mid-quality shelf unit with excellent styling and I would recommend it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for but this wasn’t worth $30. Took forever to put together. Doesn’t stand straight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Make sure to check all the pieces first!
reviews.reviewText: Cute shelf and I was really looking forward to using it but one of the holes on the metal support was not drilled all the way through. Unfortunately I had already started assembling the item so can't return it or get a refund without a whole lot of bother.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars a little tricky to assemble
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I want to state that once assembled, this small shelf unit seems pretty sturdy. I will likely be putting books on it and I think it will manage its capacity quite well.As far as ease of assembly is concerned: I had to read the instructions a couple of times before I could figure out which hardware was which. The instructions are inconsistently labelled. On page one, the hardware is not labelled with a corresponding alphabet letter to match it with the packets of nuts, bolts, etc.. On other pages, the pieces are labelled to correspond to the alphabet packets. On the positive side, there is a packet of extra pieces. I didn't need them, but sometimes when putting pieces of furniture together one does come across a defective piece. I had to buy extra pieces for a recent project, but not this one.I would recommend not following the directions as stated. Instead of attaching the top completely and then the bottom, I attached one side of each shelf then lined up the other side. I find doing it this way prevents the headache of having to realign and loosen previously attached pieces. Also, do not tighten any screws/bolts until the assembly of any one step is complete. again, this is so alignment can be made without too much headache. One of the pieces of the side bars, was out of line but not enough so that it jeopardized the integrity of the piece, but it did not fit together perfectly.All in all, a pretty sturdy shelf. Its small. I rated it 4 stars only because I had to decipher the assembly instructions more than I felt I should have.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is used as a trophy display and it works ok for me
reviews.reviewText: For the price, it make a very nice trophy display case.
